query.query: {"pigql":"q = load \"<opportunity_products>\"; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.IsWon' == \"true\"; q = group q by {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}; p = filter q by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Month', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year\"..\"current day\"]; p = foreach p generate {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(sum('TotalPrice'), 0) as 'TotalPrice'; r = filter q by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Month', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in [\"current quarter\"..\"current day\"]; r = foreach r generate {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(sum('TotalPrice'), 0) as 'ThisQuarter'; s = filter q by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Month', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in [\"1 quarter ago\"..\"current day - 1 quarter\"]; s = foreach s generate {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(sum('TotalPrice'), 0) as 'LastQuarter'; t = union r, s; t = group t by {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}; t = foreach t generate {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce((coalesce(sum('ThisQuarter'), 0) - coalesce(sum('LastQuarter'), 0)) / coalesce(sum('LastQuarter'), 0), 0) as 'QoQ'; a = filter q by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Month', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year\"..\"current day\"]; a = foreach a generate {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(sum('TotalPrice'), 0) as 'ThisYear'; b = filter q by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Month', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in [\"1 year ago\"..\"current day - 1 year\"]; b = foreach b generate {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(sum('TotalPrice'), 0) as 'LastYear'; c = union a, b; c = group c by {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}; c = foreach c generate {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce((coalesce(sum('ThisYear'), 0) - coalesce(sum('LastYear'), 0)) / coalesce(sum('LastYear'), 0), 0) as 'YoY'; x = group p by {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} full, t by {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} full, c by {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}; x = foreach x generate coalesce(p.{{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(t.{{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, c.{{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}})) as {{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(sum(p.'TotalPrice'), 0) as 'sum_TotalPrice', coalesce(sum(t.'QoQ'), 0) as 'sum_QoQ', coalesce(sum(c.'YoY'), 0) as 'sum_YoY'; x = order x by {{cell(step_grouping.selection, 0, \"order\").asObject()}} desc;","measures":"{{cell(step_grouping.selection, 0, \"measure\").asObject()}}","autoFilter":true,"groups":["{{cell(dropdown_product_level_group.selection, 0, \"value\").asObject()}}"],"filters":[],"order":[]}

{"measures":[["avg","win_rate"],["sum","TotalPrice"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<opportunity_products>\"; a = filter a by 'Opportunity.IsWon' == \"true\"; b = filter a by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Month', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year\"..\"current day\"]; c = filter a by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Month', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in [\"1 year ago\"..\"current day - 1 year\"]; d = group b by all full, c by all; d = foreach d generate coalesce((coalesce(sum(b['TotalPrice']), 0) - coalesce(sum(c['TotalPrice']), 0)) / coalesce(sum(c['TotalPrice']), 0), 0) as 'avg_win_rate', coalesce(sum(b['TotalPrice']), 0) - coalesce(sum(c['TotalPrice']), 0) as 'sum_TotalPrice'; fake = load \"<opportunity_products>\"; fake = group fake by all; fake = foreach fake generate 0 as 'sum_TotalPrice', 0 as 'avg_win_rate'; final = union d, fake; final = group final by all; final = foreach final generate sum('sum_TotalPrice') as 'sum_TotalPrice', sum('avg_win_rate') as 'avg_win_rate';","autoFilter":true,"groups":[],"dimensions":[],"order":[]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"<opportunity_products>\"; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.IsWon' == \"true\"; q = group q by ('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Quarter'); q = foreach q generate 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Year' + \"~~~\" + 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Quarter' as 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Year~~~Opportunity.CloseDate_Quarter', sum('TotalPrice') as 'TotalPrice', sum(sum('TotalPrice')) over ([ - 4.. - 4] partition by all order by ('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Quarter')) as 'last'; q = foreach q generate 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Year~~~Opportunity.CloseDate_Quarter' as'Opportunity.CloseDate_Year~~~Opportunity.CloseDate_Quarter', (sum('TotalPrice') - sum('last')) / sum('last') as 'sum_QoQ'; q = offset q 4;","measures":[["sum","QoQ"]],"autoFilter":true,"groups":[["Opportunity.CloseDate_Year","Opportunity.CloseDate_Quarter"]],"filters":[]}

{"measures":[["sum","finalcf",null,{"display":" "}]],"pigql":"a = load \"<opportunity_products>\"; a = foreach a generate (case when coalesce( {{column(kpi_yoy_percent_and_diff.result, [\"sum_TotalPrice\"]).asObject() }}, 0) > 0 then \"#3CAF6D\" when coalesce( {{column(kpi_yoy_percent_and_diff.result, [\"sum_TotalPrice\"]).asObject() }}, 0) < 0 then \"#D4504C\" else \"#7D98B3\" end) as 'RAG'; a = group a by 'RAG'; a = foreach a generate 'RAG' as 'RAG', 0.95 as 'sum_finalcf';","groups":["RAG"],"order":[]}
